project.title: The Cutest Thing You’ll See Today

style.palette: warm natural daylight (park); cozy tungsten indoor (living room)
style.lighting: soft daylight outside; warm key + soft fill inside
style.look_notes: live-action look, gentle handheld feel, skin tones natural, pets fur detail preserved

locations.name: Sunny Park / Playground
locations.backdrop: green grass, bright sky, simple play structures

locations.name: Cozy Living Room
locations.backdrop: soft fabric couch, pillows, warm lamp light

scenes.title: Character Setup
scenes.goal: generate reference images for all characters
scenes.prompt:
WIDE SHOT of Emma (child, curly hair, playful), Buddy (golden retriever puppy, energetic), and Mia (fluffy white kitten, curious) standing together; CAMERA static,
LIGHTING face evenly lit; soft key front; fill 30%; rim 60%; exposure +0.3 EV,
STYLE match REALISTIC live-action look; crisp edges; 4K,
BACKGROUND simple park lawn with soft bokeh,
CONTINUITY use reference image: none (high weight); keep identity (hair/fur/palette); continue motion ~1s,
DURATION 6–8 seconds, AUDIO none.
scenes.notes: Export individual stills for Emma, Buddy, Mia (e.g., ref_emma.png, ref_buddy.png, ref_mia.png) and attach to characters.reference_images before S01.
